title: blux
content:
hi!  
here is an experimental font called blux. I took a pixelfont, blurred and redrew it. It's supposed for headlines only. The idea is inspired by Neville Brody's Blur, though I wanted it to be different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blux_3492.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

author: saberrider
